holidays.title: National Cat Day
holidays.description: Charles Dickens said it best: "What greater gift than the love of a cat?"

holidays.title: National Internet Day
holidays.description: The world wide web. The information highway. Cyberspace. The interwebz.

holidays.title: National Pit Bull Awareness Day
holidays.description: We celebrate how loving, kind, and compassionate these dogs truly are.

holidays.title: Hug a Sheep Day
holidays.description: Join animal lovers as we celebrate the meekest of creatures on National Hug a Sheep Day.

holidays.title: Muddy dog day
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate adorable dogs rolling through muddy puddles this October!

holidays.title: National Hermit Day
holidays.description: Forego all your worldly ties for a day to recharge and enjoy your own company.

holidays.title: National Indigenous People’s Thanksgiving Day
holidays.description: Recognize, respect, and protect the rights of all indigenous peoples in the Philippines' archipelago uplands.

holidays.title: National Martina Day
holidays.description: Today, all Martinas deserve a Grand Slam because we’re celebrating them!

holidays.title: National Oatmeal Day
holidays.description: With all the way to eat oatmeal, we had to dedicate a day to it!

holidays.title: National Prescription Drug Take Back Day
holidays.description: Learn about safe ways to dispose of prescription drugs on National Prescription Drug Take-Back Day.

holidays.title: RSPB Feed the Birds Day
holidays.description: Let us all do our part to ensure the future of the bird population!

holidays.title: Turkey Republic Day
holidays.description: Come join us in celebrating the anniversary of Turkey's Republic Day!

holidays.title: World Psoriasis Day
holidays.description: Psoriasis associations strive to spread information about the condition and improve access to treatment.

holidays.title: World Stroke Day
holidays.description: Let’s become stroke-free by moving those muscles and limbs to keep healthy and active.

holidays.title: Bob Ross’s Birthday
holidays.description: American painter, exceptional art teacher, and T.V host — Bob Ross was just overflowing with skills.

holidays.title: Christopher Wallace, Jr.’s Birthday
holidays.description: Is Christopher Wallace Jr. an independent man, or is he following in his father’s footsteps?

holidays.title: Ellie Thumann’s Birthday
holidays.description: She's still young but Ellie Thumann has already made quite a name for herself online.

holidays.title: Gabrielle Union’s Birthday
holidays.description: This strong woman does not fear becoming the voice of those who share her hardships.

holidays.title: Moses Hacmon’s Birthday
holidays.description: This exceptional photographer manages to capture the beauty of nature using water.

holidays.title: Tracee Ellis Ross’s Birthday
holidays.description: We have nothing but praise for this incredibly talented, award-winning actress and comedian.

holidays.title: Winona Ryder’s Birthday
holidays.description: A brilliant actress with a unique personality, there is no question why she is loved.
